name: Finest Turkey Sausages
description: Deliciously meaty sausages, made with Turkey meat filling. This sausage has a depth of flavour and character, and is the ultimate for serving in a deep sausage butty or mixed grill. With its unique taste, this sausage is ideal for year round gourmet dining, inside or outside, and perfect for mid week meals, buffets, and barbecues. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
